title: Galaxy’s Mike Novogratz Says ‘Crypto Revolution Is Here to Stay’ Despite Selloff
sub_head: In a letter, one of crypto’s most-ardent supporters doesn’t say whether his business lost money on its Luna investment
body:
Galaxy Digital Holdings Ltd. ’s Mike Novogratz assured investors that “crypto is not going away,” even as inflation, rising interest rates and a massive selloff have rattled the markets for digital assets.
“This does not mean the crypto market will bottom and head straight back up,” Mr. Novogratz wrote Wednesday in a letter addressed to shareholders, friends, partners and the crypto community. “It will take restructuring, a redemption cycle, consolidation, and renewed confidence in crypto.”
